ComicInfo.Summary: A laboratory accident propels Fiona and Marty into an alternate dimension where apes have taken the place of humans. They are rescued from Doc Ook by the Ape-vengers and are invited back to the heroes' headquarters where Marty learns that things are not what he expected at all.
